shrimp.name: PtLineD
shrimp.description: Shortest distance between a point and a line segment
shrimp.author: rconstruct

output.name: out
output.description: The minimum distance between Q and the line segment P1 -> P2

shrimp.usage: This function returns the minimum perpendicular distance between the point Q and the line segment that passes from the point P1 to P2. Not the infinite extension of this line.
